name: KONE Corporation
membership: European Lift Association (ELA), Confederation of Finnish Industries (EK)
goal: KONE is among the global leaders in the elevator and escalator industry. We employ over 57.000 employees globally and serve a broad range of customers, providing elevators, escalators and automatic building doors, as well as solutions for their maintenance and modernisation. Our goal is to improve living conditions in cities by making mobility in buildings safe, comfortable and reliable.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: KONE follows EU initiatives and decision-making in the fields of mechanical engineering, industry, internal market, trade, energy, and health and safety.
